set_row_generator(row_generator: Callable[[Melodie.scenario_manager.Scenario], Union[dict, object]])ÔÉÅ

Set the geneator for each row. Every time the row_generator is called, this function returns a dict standing for one row. For example, if row_generator is called twice, and the return values are {‚Äúid‚Äù: 0, ‚Äúa‚Äù: 1},

and {‚Äúid‚Äù: 1, ‚Äúa‚Äù: 2}. The generated table will be:

id | a |

|----|‚Äî| | 0 | 1 | | 1 | 2 |
